articles.author: Grace Dean
articles.title: Asda restricts discount-brand sales amid soaring inflation
articles.description: Asda shoppers can only buy three of each item from its Just Essentials brand, which it says is because of huge demand and is just for "a short time."
articles.content:
Britain's third-biggest supermarket chain is restricting how many items shoppers can buy from its discount range as inflation continues to soar.
Asda introduced a new Just Essentials range in May th… [+2647 chars]

articles.author: Georg Ismar
articles.title: Debatte um fossile Energiequellen: Bundeskriminalamt warnt vor Gefahr linksextremer Attacken
articles.description: Als mögliche Aktionen der linken Szene nennt das BKA auch Sachbeschädigungen oder Brandstiftungen an Kohlekraftwerken. Konkrete Hinweise gebe es aber nicht.
articles.content: Das Bundeskriminalamt (BKA) warnt die deutschen Unternehmen wegen der Folge des russischen Kriegs in der Ukraine und der Debatten um eine verstärkte Nutzung von fossilen Energiequellen vor der Gefahr… [+3735 chars]

articles.author: Lucie Cutting
articles.title: Brandi Salmon appropriates paintings by old masters like da Vinci to include Aboriginal women
articles.description: Negative representations of Indigenous people by artists who are not Aboriginal have inspired Wiradjuri woman Brandi Salmon to re-imagine works by old masters including Vermeer and da Vinci.
articles.content:
Through the appropriation of famous paintings, artist Brandi Salmon is creating positive depictions of Aboriginal people in art in her studio in the hills of Hobart.
Negative representations of Abor… [+6274 chars]

articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: As 3D printing merger closes, MakerBot CEO steps up and Ultimaker CEO steps down
articles.description: Current MakerBot CEO Nadav Goshen will be tasked with running the new brand. While Ultimaker CEO Jürgen von Hollen will be stepping away.

articles.title: Amazon Echo Show 10: So wird der Smart Speaker zur Videokamera
